job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of predictive models for ad suitability, which falls under the core task of creating and training ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to building predictive models to identify likely converters/clickers, a key aspect of traditional ML model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of predictive models for user attribute prediction based on content consumption, fitting the definition of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This task involves data processing and management within a big data environment, aligning with data engineering and management.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: Building data pipelines and dashboards for monitoring and alerting is a core data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, â€¦)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions a 'build it, run it' mentality, encompassing development, DevOps, infra-as-code, and CI/CD, which are all MLOps related.

job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end process of model development, including experimentation, validation, implementation, and presentation of results.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines (python, PySpark, ElasticSearch, Terraform, Airflow,..)
job_tasks.justification: This task involves building data stacks and pipelines, which is a core responsibility of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions building an ML Ops platform, which falls under MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This describes integrating services with other teams, a typical software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership of models, jobs, and applications is a software engineering responsibility, particularly in a 'you build it, you run it' context.

job_tasks.phrase: 80% is bouwen aan de data stack, web applicaties & incrementele verbeteringen
job_tasks.justification: The majority of the role is focused on building data stacks, web applications, and improvements, which are core software engineering tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
soft_skills.justification: Participation in scrum ceremonies like standups, refinements, retros, and demos indicates collaboration and communication within a team.

soft_skills.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
soft_skills.justification: Presenting results to dev and business teams is a clear communication task.

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
soft_skills.justification: Taking ownership and accountability for models, jobs, and applications demonstrates innovation and ownership.
Experimenting with different models implies a willingness to learn and adapt to new approaches.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional ML tasks such as building predictive models for advertising, audience segmentation, and user attribute prediction. While it mentions building data pipelines, MLOps, and integrating services (Macro-Category A tasks), the core of the role is model development (Macro-Category B). There is no mention of Generative AI specific technologies like LLMs, RAG, or prompt engineering. Therefore, the role aligns best with a 'Core ML Engineer' profile, emphasizing traditional ML model development and deployment.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed about the specific types of models to be built and the technologies used. The responsibilities are well-defined, allowing for a confident classification into the 'Core ML Engineer' profile without ambiguity.
